work.name: Vrije Universiteit Brussel
work.summary: I worked on numerous research projects throghout my time as a doctoral researcher. My main focus was on the topics of: Usability, User Engagement, Accessibility for Elderly users aas well as educational games. As my main Ph.D project I carried out evaluations of existing research & services as well as carried out interviews and user studies on live platforms around Europe. I also developed both proof of concept web platforms, games and other software solutions

work.name: Ubilife
work.summary:
worked on two development projects during my time at Ubilife. 

Running Othello2: Two player android game that used NFC tags to simulate Othello board. Game also had additional sensor based physical tasks and educational material related to physical education

Minerva: A programming education game that also adapts to the play and Learning style of the player. Client-side developed on Unity3D and back-end using Spring boot & MySQL
